Carter Brey (amụrụ n'afọ 1954) bụ onye America cello virtuoso
O nwere ọrụ solo na-arụpụta ihe site na 1981 ruo 1996 mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye isi cello nke New York Philharmonic, ọkwá ọ ka na-ejide taa.

A mụrụ Carter Brey na Montclair, New Jersey ma too na Westchester County, New York. Ọ malitere ịkpọ violin mgbe ọ dị afọ 9 na cello mgbe ọ dị dingwaga 12 n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, ọ bụ ezie na ọ tụgharịghị echiche ịghọ onye na-agụ egwú ruo mgbe ọ dị iri na isii
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'okpuru Laurence Lesser na Stephen Kates na Mahadum Johns Hopkins's Peabody Institute ma mesịa soro Aldo Parisot na Mahadim Yale, ebe ọ bụ Wardell Fellow na Houpt Scholar
Ọ kụziri na Mahadum nke South Florida n'etiti oge ya na Peabody na Yale
N'afọ 1979, ọ sonyeere ndị Cleveland Orchestra ebe ọ gbara egwu oge abụọ.

Brey bịara n'ihu mba ụwa n'afọ 1981 mgbe ọ meriri ihe nrite nke atọ nke asọmpi Rostropovich International Cello, nke mere ka ọ kpọọ Robert Schumann Cello concerto n'okpuru Mstislav Rostropovich na National Symphony Orchestra n'afọ 1983
N'afọ 1982, ọ meriri na Young Concert Artists International Auditions, nke dugara na New York City recital debut ya na 92nd Street Y

Mmeri asọmpi ndị a malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri cello ma kemgbe ahụ, ya na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ndị ọ bụla na-eme symphony orchestra na United States n'okpuru ndị nduzi dị ka Claudio Abbado, Lorin Maazel, Kurt Masur, Semyon Bychkov, Sergiu Comissiona, na Christoph von Dohnanyi.
Dị ka onye na-agụ  egwu ,Breyhas performed with the Tokyo string Quartet,

The Emerson string Quartet New York youth symphony and the chamber music society of Lincoln centre.he has performed at the spoleto festivals in tje United States and Italy the santa Dr  chamber Music festival,the La Jolla Chamber music festival and elsewhere.
Brey bi na New York City
Ọ sonyeere ngalaba nke Curtis Institute of Music na 2008.
